sentences.en: Auckland is the largest city of new zealand, on an isthmus of northwest North Island.
sentences.cn: 奥克兰是新西兰最大的城市, 位于北岛西北部地峡.

sentences.en: In every heart period, the max deformation scope of the aorta lies descending thoracic aortic isthmus.
sentences.cn: 在每个心动周期, 主动脉变形幅度最大处位于降主动脉峡部.

sentences.en: In which part of the world is the Isthmus located?
sentences.cn: 苏伊士地峡位于世界的哪一部分?

sentences.en: Isthmus in these two carats in the House, the west by the Andaman Sea.
sentences.cn: 克拉地峡在这两个府境内, 西濒安达曼海.

sentences.en: It was the neck of land which we call the Isthmus of Panama.
sentences.cn: 这个陆地的狭窄地带,我们称之为巴拿马地峡.

sentences.en: Methods All 96 with nodule were operated by resection of only thyroid and its isthmus.
sentences.cn: 方法总结96例甲状腺结节患者行一侧腺叶加峡部切除所采取的术式.

sentences.en: North America is connected with South America by the Isthmus of Panama.
sentences.cn: 巴拿马海峡把北美同南美连接起来.

sentences.en: Objective : To analyze the clinical significance of modified thyroidectomy by trans - isthmus approach.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨经峡部径路行甲状腺手术的临床价值.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the value of CT Opposite Scanning Technique in Lumbar Isthmus diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨腰椎峡部CT反向扫描技术的价值.

sentences.en: The ablation target site was the isthmus between tricuspid valve annulus and inferior vana cava.
sentences.cn: 位于三尖瓣环和下腔静脉口间的峡部为消融部位.

sentences.en: The Isthmus of Panama joins North and South America.
sentences.cn: 巴拿马地峡将北美和南美连接起来.

sentences.en: The normal upper limit of VA isthmus was 4.4 mm by 1.5 mm ( length by width ).
sentences.cn: 正常va峡部的上限值为4.4mm×1.5mm ( 长×宽 ).

sentences.en: The north and south of the island are linked by a narrow isthmus.
sentences.cn: 岛的北部和南部由一条狭窄的地峡相连.

sentences.en: The thyroid right lobe and a left lobe connected by a narrow isthmus.
sentences.cn: 位于颈部气管前,由左右两叶及中间的峡部构成.

sentences.en: This fact has led naturalists to believe that the Isthmus was formerly open.
sentences.cn: 使许多自然学者相信这个地蛱在以前原是开通的.

trans.tran_en: a narrow piece of land with water on both sides, that connects two larger areas of land
